description:
Eric is one tall dude. He is likely about 6 foot 3 and his dick kept growing too.
I wanted to get this guy in ASAP, as I thought he might get snatched up by another studio, so no time to wait for his pubes to grow back out. Sorry about that.
I do care, but geeeez, he is one hot guy. Beautiful face, lean muscle build, and cock that goes on and on and on!
He was confident in front of the camera, as he has done professional modeling as well. I think he wants to follow 'mainstream' modeling, so I am not sure I can convince him to come back and get that fire hose of his sucked-off.
Ya never know though. I think he did the shoot to get over a quick financial emergency, and I don't want to wish him ill-will, but would love to see him again.
It's an awesome solo, and an awesome cumshot. Hope you enjoy him!
title: Eric Schor - Solo
